description.p: Setup for running an experiment on the LabEquipment. 'SomeParameter' takes a number in the range of 10 to 900 and generates a random number for the result.
The experiment is run by a driver in the LabEquipment and an artifical delay has been included to make this experiment more realistic.
Try validating by giving 'SomeParameter' no value, non-number value, non-integer value and an out-of-range value.
Setup for running an experiment as a simulation on the LabServer. 'SomeParameter' takes a number in the range of 10 to 900 and generates a random number for the result.
The experiment is run by a driver in the LabServer and a software delay has been included to make this experiment more realistic.
Try validating by giving 'SomeParameter' no value, non-number value, non-integer value and an out-of-range value.
